name: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Zombies Free Access
name_original: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Zombies Free Access
description:
Live from January 14th to January 21st.

Experience the next generation of Zombies with Black Ops Cold War Zombies Free Access*.

Black Ops Cold War Zombies is set to take veterans and newcomers alike on a bold and terrifying journey that expands on an iconic part of the Call of Duty® franchise. This co-op mode includes new ways to progress, classic Perks and an arsenal of Cold War-era Zombies weaponry that will help survivors dominate the legions of undead.

*Xbox Live Gold required for Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One players.

For more information, please visit www.callofduty.com.
